name: Mechanical Golem
resistance: fire; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
conimmunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
languages: understands one language known by its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: The golem deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The golem makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Chest Cannon (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 40/120 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (3d6) bludgeoning damage. Hit or miss, the target and each creature within 20 feet of it must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.
